main event: On 19 November 1963, a close approach of an unidentified bright white light object was observed, which zigzagged, dipped, and rose at varying speeds for a duration of 5 years.
interesting points: The object made sudden and instantaneous turns,The observers were unsure if the object was distant or close,Daily sightings occurred over a 5-year period, The object was reported to have a stretched oval shape and bright white color with a reddish tinge, The observer described the sighting as rapid and visually striking with no normal aircraft characteristics.
witness description: Unemployed individual just out of the Marines, previously a ground observer.
